PerfectNetExp.abs: 雌字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 雌花〖 femaleflower;pistillateflower〗 雌黄〖 arsenictrisulphide;orpiment〗 雌儿〖 youngwoman〗.
中药的英文翻译 ... 大黄 rhubarb horse-tails 雄黄 orpiment 雌黄 gamboge.
... oriole 黄鹂,金莺 orpiment 雌黄,三硫化二砷 orphrey 法衣上的绣带.
供应Herb Powders，Chinese... ... 川木通粉末 Clematis armandi Franch 雌黄粉末 Orpiment 刺玫花粉末 Rosa davurica Pall.

list.abs: orpiment relay room use electricity generated by the field coil to drive the reed switch to open close movements .磁簧继电器是利用线圈通过电产生的磁场来驱动磁簧开关进行开放关闭动作。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin auripigmentum, from aurum 'gold' + pigmentum 'pigment'

means.word_mean: 1. a yellow mineral occuring in conjunction with realgar; an ore of arsenic
